mindful_attention_awareness_survey_10.Description: I get so focused on the goal I want to achieve that I lose touch with what I am doing right now to get there.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_11.Description: I do jobs or tasks automatically, without being aware of what Im doing.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_12.Description: I find myself listening to someone with one ear, doing something else at the same time.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_13.Description: I drive places on 'automatic pilot' and then wonder why I went there.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_14.Description: I find myself preoccupied with the future or the past.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_15.Description: I find myself doing things without paying attention.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_16.Description: I snack without being aware that I'm eating.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_2.Description: I could be experiencing some emotion and not be conscious of it until some time later.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_3.Description: I break or spill things because of carelessness, not paying attention, or thinking of something else.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_4.Description: I find it difficult to stay focused on whats happening in the present.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_5.Description: I tend to walk quickly to get where Im going without paying attention to what I experience along the way.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_6.Description: I tend not to notice feelings of physical tension or discomfort until they really grab my attention.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_7.Description: I forget a person's name almost as soon as I've been told it for the first time.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_8.Description: It seems I am 'running on automatic' without much awareness of what Im doing.

mindful_attention_awareness_survey_9.Description: I rush through activities without being really attentive to them.
